name: Imperium Romanum: The Conquest of Britannia
name_original: Imperium Romanum: The Conquest of Britannia
description:
Imperium Romanum: The Conquest of Britannia is a strategy game developed by Haemimont Games. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by Kalypso Media.
Imperium Romanum: The Conquest of Britannia is available on PC.
